Articles.Content:
I get a similar bug in my 0.90 install sometimes, and seem to have found a possible workaround. If I leave a craft near the space centre, but do not retrieve it, I can click it to "fly" and get out of the locked menu. As when I then return to the space centre, everything is working again.

This is no good if I get a full "freeze" of the game, but is ok when I can move the camera but cannot select any buildings.

Anyone else able to use this as a work around?

PS, thought I do have Claw's "fix" mode installed, so no idea if this effects it, will have to test later...

Edited January 17, 2015 by Technical Ben
